metadata.title: CVE-2024-22049 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: httparty before 0.21.0 is vulnerable to an assumed-immutable web parametervulnerability. A remote and unauthenticated attacker can provide a craftedfilename parameter during multipart/form-data uploads which could result inattacker controlled filenames being written.

criterions.comment: ruby-httparty package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
